members.name: Cam Paul
members.bio: Cam Paul—codename Court Chief—is the agile, high-energy leader of the Advanced Spartan Corp. His pink Spartan armor is inspired by Halo with personal flair, emphasizing mobility, team synergy, and explosive aerial strikes. Cam's leadership holds the trio together, directing Chemoshock's constructs and Huntsman's precision shots.
members.notes: Shortest only compared to Ben; height equal to Alex.

members.name: Ben Preston
members.bio: Ben Preston—codename Chemoshock—is the intellect and engineering backbone of the Spartan trio. His neon green armor blends Halo tech with scientific, chemical inspirations. He shapes solid-energy constructs into shields, weapons, tools, and environmental structures that support his squad.
members.notes: The tallest of the Spartan three.

members.name: Alex Croft

suit.name: Huntsman Armor
suit.color: Purple Halo-inspired armor with Monster Hunter influence

members.bio: Alex Croft—codename Huntsman—is the silent, lethal precision shooter of the Spartan team. His purple Spartan armor carries Monster Hunter and Halo influences, making him a perfect long-range specialist. His hunting skills and mechanical instincts make him deadly and adaptable.
members.notes: Same height as Cam; taller only than Night Hawk.
